name: Media Distribution Solutions
tag_list: video, social-media-marketing, video-advertising, social-media-advertising, white-label-solutions, digital-marketing-solutions, reputation-management, reputation-monitoring, content-providers
overview: Media Distribution Solutions (MDS) delivers a comprehensive Owned, Paid and Earned digital marketing solution to all small and mid-sized businesses. MDS specializes in the creation and delivery of video and social media content that helps power the presence of a business across multiple sites and on multiple devices. MDS monitors and manages a businesses presence by listening to what people are saying all across the web and reporting that information back to the business in real time allowing the business to maximize every opportunity. MDS delivers the technology that allows businesses to participate in paid advertising opportunities across all search engines and social media platforms. MDS technology is a white labeled suite of products that allows retailers to offer powerful, comprehensive digital marketing solutions to their customers at scale.
